name: Asphalt 5
description: A high-speed arcade racer with licensed cars and exotic locations.

name: Asphalt 6: Adrenaline
description: Race through stunning locations, customize your dream cars, and feel the adrenaline in this arcade racer.

name: Asphalt 7: Heat
description: A fast-paced racer with beautiful graphics, a huge roster of cars, and online multiplayer.

name: Asphalt 8: Airborne+
description: High-speed racing action with stunts and stunning gameplay.

name: Assassin's Creed
description: The first game in the series, introducing the Assassin Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad.

name: Assassin's Creed Brotherhood
description: The sequel to Assassin's Creed II, where Ezio Auditore rebuilds the Assassin Brotherhood in Rome.

name: Assassin's Creed Chronicles Trilogy
description: A series of 2.5D side-scrolling stealth games.

name: Assassin's Creed II
description: The sequel to the original, introducing the protagonist Ezio Auditore.

name: Assassin's Creed III
description: The original game set during the American Revolution, introducing a new protagonist and setting.

name: Assassin's Creed III Remastered
description: A remastered version of the game set during the American Revolution.

name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag
description: A game combining the Assassin's Creed series with a pirate setting, featuring extensive naval exploration.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage
description: A modern return to the series' stealth-focused roots, set in 9th-century Baghdad.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey
description: An action RPG set in ancient Greece during the Peloponnesian War.

name: Assassin's Creed Origins Gold Edition
description: An action RPG set in ancient Egypt, exploring the origins of the Assassin Brotherhood.

name: Assassin's Creed Revelations
description: The final chapter in the Ezio Auditore and Altaïr Ibn-La'Ahad trilogies.

name: Assassin's Creed Rogue
description: A game where players control a former Assassin who joins the Templars, featuring naval gameplay.

name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate Gold Edition
description: An action-adventure game set in Victorian-era London, with a focus on twin protagonists.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity
description: A game set during the French Revolution, featuring cooperative multiplayer.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla
description: An action RPG set in the Viking Age, where players take on the role of a Viking raider.

name: Assetto Corsa
description: Realistic racing simulator focusing on authentic driving physics, detailed car and track modeling, and extensive modding support.

name: Assetto Corsa: Competizione
description: The official GT World Challenge racing simulator, featuring accurate car and track reproductions.

name: Assetto Corsa: EVO
description: An expansion or evolution of the original Assetto Corsa, featuring new content and improvements.

name: Blur
description: Arcade-style racing vehicular combat video game incorporating real world cars and locales with power-ups.

name: Call of Duty 2
description: WWII first-person shooter offering intense campaigns across multiple fronts.

name: Call of Duty: United Offensive
description: Expansion to the original Call of Duty with new campaigns and maps.

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
description: Modern-era military FPS that redefined the series with intense combat and cinematic storytelling.

name: Call of Duty: World at War
description: Return to WWII with brutal Pacific and Eastern Front battles.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2
description: Sequel to Modern Warfare, delivering intense cinematic missions.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
description: Cold War-era shooter blending covert operations with explosive missions.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 3
description: Global conflict reaches its climax in the Modern Warfare trilogy.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops II
description: Branching storylines and futuristic tech in a Cold War sequel.

name: Call of Duty: Ghosts
description: Post-apocalyptic warfare with a new squad system.

name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare
description: Futuristic shooter introducing exosuits and high-tech weaponry.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III
description: Cybernetic soldiers and futuristic warfare in a high-tech world.

name: Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare
description: Interplanetary warfare with a cinematic singleplayer campaign.

name: Call of Duty: WWII
description: Cinematic WWII campaign and classic multiplayer action.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (2019)
description: A gritty reboot of the Modern Warfare series with photorealistic visuals.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War
description: Cold War espionage and covert missions with multiplayer and zombies modes.

name: Call of Duty: Vanguard
description: WWII shooter exploring multiple theaters of war.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: The sequel to the 2019 reboot, continuing the story with updated graphics and gameplay.

name: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III
description: The latest entry in the Modern Warfare series, featuring a new campaign, multiplayer, and zombies mode.

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6
description: The latest entry in the Black Ops series, featuring next-gen visuals and gripping action.

name: Call of Duty: NX1 (Future Warfare)
description: A leaked prototype of an unreleased Call of Duty title, codenamed 'NX1' or 'Future Warfare', for Xbox and PC.

name: Crysis Remastered
description: A remastered version of the classic sci-fi first-person shooter with upgraded graphics and improved performance.

name: F1 2010
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2011
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2012
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2013
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2014
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2015
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2016
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2017
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2018
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2019
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: F1 2020
description: A racing game from the F1 series.

name: Forza Horizon (1)
description: The first open-world racing game in the Horizon spin-off series, featuring a music festival theme.

name: Forza Horizon - ALL DLC
description: The first open-world Forza experience set during the fictional Horizon Festival, including all DLC, now playable on PC via emulation.

name: Forza Horizon 2
description: Explore a massive open world with dynamic weather and day-night cycles, available on PC.

name: Forza Horizon 2 Presents Fast And Furious
description: A standalone expansion to Forza Horizon 2, featuring cars and themes from the Fast & Furious film series, for PC.

name: Forza Horizon 2 Presents Fast And Furious
description: A standalone expansion to Forza Horizon 2 themed around the Fast & Furious film series.

name: Forza Horizon 3
description: Lead the Horizon Festival in Australia, expanding it with new events and locations, on PC.

name: Forza Horizon 4
description: Race through a beautiful, historic Britain in a shared open world with dynamic seasons, for PC.

name: Forza Motorsport 2
description: The second installment in the highly acclaimed racing simulation series, now playable on PC via emulation.

name: Forza Motorsport 3
description: Experience the thrill of over 400 cars and 100 tracks in stunning HD, now playable on PC via emulation.

name: Forza Motorsport 4
description: A racing simulation game with new features like the Autovista mode and a large selection of cars.

name: Forza Motorsport 4 - All DLC
description: The definitive racing simulation with a vast car roster and detailed tracks, including all DLC, now playable on PC via emulation.

name: Forza Motorsport 6 Apex
description: A free-to-play Forza Motorsport experience designed for Windows 10, featuring stunning graphics and a curated selection of cars and tracks.

name: Forza Motorsport 7
description: Experience the ultimate automotive playground with over 700 cars and 30 destinations, now on Windows.

name: Gran Turismo 1
description: The groundbreaking racing simulation that set new standards for realism and depth on the PlayStation.

name: Gran Turismo 2
description: Expanded on the original with more cars, tracks, and deeper customization, a must-play for racing enthusiasts.

name: Gran Turismo 3 - A Spec
description: A pivotal entry in the series, leveraging the power of PlayStation 2 for enhanced graphics and physics.

name: Gran Turismo 4
description: Known for its massive car list, detailed physics, and iconic Photo Mode, pushing PS2 capabilities.

name: Gran Turismo 5
description: The first main Gran Turismo title for PS3, featuring premium and standard cars, extensive online features, and stunning visuals.

name: Gran Turismo 6
description: Celebrating 15 years of Gran Turismo, this entry brought more cars, tracks, and a new physics engine to the PS3.

name: Gran Turismo HD Concept
description: A tech demo for the PlayStation 3, showcasing the series' graphical potential in high definition.

name: Grand Theft Auto IV
description: An action-adventure game with a new protagonist, Niko Bellic, set in a reimagined Liberty City.

name: Grand Theft Auto V
description: A crime-action game with three protagonists, set in the state of San Andreas.

name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
description: A crime-action game following Carl "CJ" Johnson in the fictional state of San Andreas.

name: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance
description: A fast-paced, action-oriented spin-off of the Metal Gear series, focusing on high-speed sword combat as the cyborg ninja Raiden.

name: Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty
description: A sequel to the original Metal Gear Solid, featuring new protagonist Raiden and a complex plot involving virtual reality and conspiracies.

name: Metal Gear Solid 3: Snake Eater
description: The original game from 2004, a prequel to the Metal Gear series that explores the origin story of Big Boss.

name: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater
description: A full, enhanced remake of the classic tactical espionage action game Metal Gear Solid 3, with updated graphics and modern controls.

name: Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes
description: A prologue to The Phantom Pain, serving as an introduction to the new open-world gameplay style and narrative.

name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
description: A massive open-world stealth-action game following the events of Ground Zeroes, with a focus on freedom of approach and tactical espionage.

name: Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol. 1
description: A compilation of classic Metal Gear titles, including Metal Gear Solid 1, 2, and 3, along with other bonus content.

name: Need for Speed: Carbon
description: Race for control of the city's districts with your crew, facing off against rivals in canyon duels.

name: Need for Speed: Heat
description: Master the art of street racing by day and risk it all by night in high-stakes races against rogue cops.

name: Need For Speed: Hot Pursuit
description: High-speed racing action with stunning visual effects.

name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit (2010)
description: A high-speed racing game focusing on intense police chases and exotic cars.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2005) Black Edition
description: A classic street racing game with police chases and a blacklist of rival racers to defeat.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted (2012) Limited Edition
description: An open-world racing game with a focus on competitive multiplayer and social features.

name: Need For Speed: Most Wanted 2005
description: High-speed racing action with stunning visual effects.

name: Need for Speed: Most Wanted 2012
description: Outsmart cops and rivals, utilizing open-world freedom in this adrenaline-fueled racer.

name: Need for Speed: Payback
description: Seek revenge against The House, a cartel controlling the city's casinos, criminals, and cops.

name: Need for Speed: Porsche Unleashed
description: Experience the evolution of Porsche cars through different eras in this detailed racing simulator.

name: Need for Speed: ProStreet
description: A racing game focused on legal street racing events in closed courses, featuring realistic car damage and physics.

name: Need for Speed: Rivals Complete Edition
description: Play as either a cop or a racer in a vast open-world, using various pursuits tech.

name: Need for Speed: Shift
description: A simulation-focused Need for Speed title offering a realistic racing experience with intense cockpit views.

name: Need for Speed: The Run
description: Embark on a high-stakes, cross-country race from San Francisco to New York.

name: Need for Speed: Undercover
description: Go deep undercover to take down an international crime syndicate in high-stakes chases.

name: Need for Speed: Underground
description: Dive into the world of illegal street racing with extensive car customization and a story mode.

name: Need for Speed: Underground 2
description: Expand on the original with a larger open world, more customization options, and new racing modes.

name: Need for Speed: Underground 2
description: The sequel to Need for Speed Underground, featuring a larger open world and more extensive car customization.

name: Real Racing 2
description: Experience championship racing with licensed cars, a robust career mode, and stunning graphics.

name: The Crew
description: A racing game set in a persistent open world recreation of the contiguous United States, featuring both role-playing and large-scale multiplayer elements.

name: Project Gotham Racing 3
description: An arcade-style racing game focused on style-based driving and city circuit racing.

name: Project Gotham Racing 4
description: The final entry in the Project Gotham Racing series, featuring motorcycles, dynamic weather, and expanded cities.

name: Skate
description: A realistic skateboarding game introducing the flick-it control system.

name: Skate 2
description: The sequel to Skate, featuring an expanded open world and deeper trick system.

name: Skate 3
description: The third entry in the Skate series, adding team-based gameplay and expanded online features.
